__e: Between this and the police chatter I pick up on my hearing aid, it's like a damn party in my head.
I'm-I'm sorry if I caught you at a bad time, but I was really wanting to speak with you.
He caught us in the park once, and I was like, "seriously?"
No, no, I get it, I get it.
Yeah, I get it, I get it, but we got a CIA plane waiting for us right now.
No, no, no, no, I get it, I get it-- you're busy.
You are a rogue. I knew it the first moment I saw you.
All right, fine. I get what you're saying.
